project.name: jwsur2-ch3
project.description:
Java Web Services: Up and Running, 2e, ISBN-10: 1449365116, ISBN-13: 978-1449365110, chapter 3, modified practice code. Original code can be found here: https://github.com/mkalin/jwsur2
To run, navigate to 'jwsur-ch3', run 'mvn clean package jetty:run' and then hit 'http://localhost:8080/jwsur2-ch3/pages/cds/getCDs.jsp' from the browser.
To start Jetty in debug mode, run 'mvn clean package jetty:run-forked'.
